snippet.title: Paper Mario: TTYD Hero Mode | Trailer (READ DESCRIPTION)
snippet.description:
💥Subscribe & Like for more!💥
---------------------------------------------
The Trailer is finally here! I'll answer some questions I think I would get!

Q: Why did V3 take so long?
A: The scope of Hero Mode has increased vastly since development on V3 started, originally it was meant to be V2 with a few new tweaks, however it now also has new songs, badges, story, skins, and new mechanics!

Q: How much does the demo change?
A: Once completed, the V3 demo will end after entering Chapter 2's pipe.

Q: Will future updates of the demo add more chapters?
A: Yes. Chapter 2, balances changes, and general bug fixes.

Q: When will the demo / full game come out?
A: There is no release date. It will come out when it’s ready.

Q: How can I get a US TTYD ISO?
A: You need a legal copy of TTYD (US) and a softmodded wii, you can look up a guide on how to dump the rom from the disc.

Q: Can we see anything you're working on?
A: Yeah, in my discord: https://discord.gg/t8NXUUD

Q: Do you Like Mario?
A: I am Mario.

I hope you all enjoyed the video, It was fun making and I did rush the ending a bit but It had to be done. I have to finish polishing the DEMO and I did NOT want the trailer to consume all of my time doing so! So here is a treat for now! See ya soon.
---------------------------------------------
My Socials:
►Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/ReedQT
►Twitter: https://twitter.com/Reed_QT
►Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/Reed_QT
►Discord: https://discord.gg/t8NXUUD
►TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@Reed_QTpie
---------------------------------------------
♫Music♪ - カミイロアワセ · binaria
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EVzB53BK9Xc
